Text: RE Wheatland and Gleason Facilities Visits Cc to confirm and update the schedule information relative to the Wheatland Facility due diligence visit Persons Attending Mr Barry T OBrien Aquila Energy Corporation Vice President of Technical Services Mr Gene Russell UtiliCorp United AECs parent Director of Environmental Services Mr Ray Racine Waldron Engineering Inc Technical Consultant Mr Racine and Waldron Engineering Inc are technical consultants to Aquila Energy Corporation the firm and the individual are obligated under a Confidentiality Agreement that extends to through and including the provisions of the CA between Enron and AEC for this matter The party will travel from Evansville on the morning of Thursday October Due to the travel time from Evansville it will be necessary to reschedule the commencement of the meeting at Wheatland to AM If you have any questions or concerns regarding the Wheatland Visit please contact Mr OBrien Telephone or via email Regarding the Gleason Facility Please be advised that I will not be visiting the Gleason Facility on Wednesday October as prevously scheduled You may consider this visit cancelled Best regards H Dana Smith Aquila Energy Merchant Energy Partners Walnut Street Suite Kansas City MO Direct Telephone Facsimile Email

Schedule for Site Visits Cc Ben Rogers Enron North America Corp Dear Mr Rogers Permit me to take this opportunity to request the following schedule for site visits by Aquila Energy Corporation representatives Our preference is as follows Gleason Generating Facility October Visitor will be Barry T OBrien Vice President of Technical Services email Please anticipate commencement of visit between the hours of and AM local prevailing time Wheatland Generating Facility October I will be the visitor Please anticipate commencement of hte visit between the hours of and AM local prevailing time Be advised that both Mr OBrien and I are away on business through Tuesday the th of October I will attempt to reach you by telephone tomorrow to confirm the above as being satisfactory If for some reason we are not able to communicate tomorrow then will you please respond via voice mail to my telephone Best regards H Dana Smith PE Aquila Energy Merchant Energy Partners Walnut Street Suite Kansas City MO Direct Telephone Facsimile Email
